gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 105, Clippers 101
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Clippers, 105-101. Desmond Bane led all scorers with 27 points, four rebounds, and six assists for the Grizzlies, while Marcus Smart added 17 points and seven assists in the victory. Paul George tallied 26 points, seven rebounds, and seven assists for the Clippers in the losing effort. The Grizzlies improve to 2-8 on the season, while the Clippers fall to 3-6.
